Low Fidelity Design

My Approach

While including the ability to easily share tokens is Gerald’s goal, Kelly and her husband could also take advantage of this feature with her children. On the other hand, Kelly would love to have further rating information on video games, while Gerald may want to track scores and stats for games if his coworkers are interested in future BarQode outings.

Therefore, BarQode’s mobile app can fulfill both opportunities by make token purchase and sharing easy while also having game stats readily available for users.
